snippet: Mr. Weinstein, whose company shepherded “The Artist,’' a French-made film, to an Oscar victory, is being decorated with a chevalier’s rank at a ceremony in Paris.
abstract: Mr. Weinstein, whose company shepherded “The Artist,’' a French-made film, to an Oscar victory, is being decorated with a chevalier’s rank at a ceremony in Paris.

headline.main: From France Avec L'Amour: Another Honor for Harvey Weinstein
